verses.verse: Then I lifted <WH5375> up my eyes <WH5869> and looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> [there was] a man <WH376> with a measuring <WH4060> line <WH9112> in his hand. <WH3027>

So I said, <WH559> "Where <WH575> are you going <WH1980>?" And he said <WH559> to me, "To measure <WH4058> Jerusalem, <WH3389> to see <WH7200> how <WH4100> wide <WH7341> it is and how <WH4100> long <WH753> it is."
And behold, <WH2009> the angel <WH4397> who was speaking <WH1696> with me was going <WH3318> out, and another <WH312> angel <WH4397> was coming <WH3318> out to meet <WH7122> him,

and said <WH559> to him, "Run, <WH7323> speak <WH1696> to that young <WH5288> man, <WH5288> saying, <WH559> 'Jerusalem <WH3389> will be inhabited <WH3427> without <WH6519> walls, <WH6519> because <WH4480> of the multitude <WH7230> of men <WH120> and cattle <WH929> within <WH8432> it.
'For I,' declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'will be a wall <WH2346> of fire <WH784> around <WH5439> her, and I will be the glory <WH9202> in her midst. <WH8432>' "

"Ho <WH1945> there! <WH1945> Flee <WH5127> from the land <WH776> of the north, <WH6828>" declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> "for I have dispersed <WH6566> you as the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of the heavens, <WH8064>" declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068>
"Ho, <WH1945> Zion! <WH6726> Escape, <WH4422> you who are living <WH3427> with the daughter <WH1323> of Babylon. <WH894>"

For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> "After <WH310> glory <WH9202> He has sent <WH7971> me against <WH413> the nations <WH1471> which plunder <WH7997> you, for he who touches <WH5060> you, touches <WH5060> the apple <WH892> of His eye. <WH5869>

"For behold, <WH2009> I will wave <WH5130> My hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> them, so that they will be plunder <WH7998> for their slaves. <WH5647> Then you will know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has sent <WH7971> Me.

"Sing <WH7442> for joy <WH7442> and be glad, <WH8055> O daughter <WH1323> of Zion; <WH6726> for behold <WH2009> I am coming <WH935> and I will dwell <WH7931> in your midst, <WH8432>" declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068>

"And many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> will join <WH3867> themselves to the Lord <WH3068> in that day <WH3117> and will become <WH1961> My people. <WH5971> Then I will dwell <WH7931> in your midst, <WH8432> and you will know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has sent <WH7971> Me to you.
"And the Lord <WH3068> will possess <WH5157> Judah <WH3063> as His portion <WH2506> in the holy <WH6944> land, <WH127> and will again <WH5750> choose <WH977> Jerusalem. <WH3389>
"Be silent, <WH2013> all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> for He is aroused <WH5782> from His holy <WH6944> habitation. <WH4583>"
